name: Earfcake
description:
This prototype was made during the LOVEJam 2022. It was finished before the deadline, but I didn't upload it due to shame. With time, I would like to iterate on this project to flesh it out into something cleaner and (hopefully) more fun.

Controls:

Enter to play.

Player 1:  WASD

Player 2: Up/Left/Down/Right arrow keys

This game was written in TypeScript, then converted to Lua using TSTL.
